description: A curated collection of data points used within the Tez Lab application, including contract addresses, tutorial videos, and relevant links.

newtroCollectiveDrops.name: Newtro Collective Drops

specialProjects.name: ARCHITYPES Composer
specialProjects.description: A collaborative project from Kristen Ross and Kerim Safa, allowing users to compose words with a living alphabet of NFTs.
